name: Cook Story
description:
Backstory

Ken’ichi has had a cafe (Riverstar) passed down to him from his late uncle Genjirou. He had visited the cafe in the suburbs of Tokyo nearly everyday when he was young but stopped when he moved away. One day he receives a letter stating that the cafe is now his. His uncle had being fighting an illness for a year before he passed and the cafe has been neglected during that time. It’s up to Ken’ichi to build up the cafe to its former glory.

Features
  • 27 recipes to discover!
  • Buy ingredients and utensils from various shops
  • Using the ingredients you bought, cook with them and master all the recipes
  • The full box set of "Cooking with Pete" included! All 11 episodes available, giving you helpful guides on how to cook "Tiny Peter's famous dishes"
  • As you culinary knowledge increases, more and more customers will come to your cafe
Developer Notes
  • This is a prototype and not a full game
  • Gameplay may still be unbalanced and minor bugs may occur
